output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: - No CMF number is visible in the post
2. Refers to candidate: - Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion", who is a presidential candidate - Uses hashtag #georgesimionpresedinte
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, it's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets a large audience (500,001-1,000,000 people) - Promotes a public march in Suceava - Has received 5,000-5,999 impressions
4. Electoral objective: - Clear electoral objective promoting a presidential candidate - Uses campaign-specific hashtags (#georgesimionpresedinte #alegeri2024) - Organizes a support march specifically for the candidate
5. Journalism: - This is not journalistic content - It's a direct campaign activity announcement
6. Personal opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but an organized campaign activity
This is clearly electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria under Article 36(7): a) Directly references a candidate b) Used during campaign period c) Has clear electoral objective d) Is not journalistic content

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes presidential candidate George Simion - Organizes a campaign march - Uses electoral hashtags - Is a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - Has clear electoral intent through the promotion of a support march
conclusion.message-for-police: SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO S.R.L, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mars electoral in sprijinul candidatului George Simion prin intermediul unei reclame platite pe Facebook si Instagram (ID: 546433941508702) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Reclama are caracter electoral explicit, promovand un mars de sustinere pentru candidatul la presedintie si utilizand hashtag-uri electorale (#georgesimionpresedinte). Continutul a fost distribuit catre un public larg estimat intre 500.001 si 1.000.000 de persoane, avand un impact direct asupra procesului electoral in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
